title: Action Learning Simulation Course for Leadership Development and Organizational Learning Capacity Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding and practical experience with organizational behavior and leadership theories
context.additional_context: Customized training for mid-level managers requiring leadership competencies in science-related public institutions

learning_goals: Cultivating the ability to establish leadership strategies that integrate ethical decision-making and political competencies in politically complex organizational environments
Applying team-based problem-solving techniques to action learning projects to derive and implement practical organizational change initiatives
Building a collaborative environment that fosters psychological safety through simulations and acquiring conflict management skills
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
